name.description: The name of the provider to create.

saml_metadata_document.description: An XML document generated by an identity provider that supports SAML 2.0.

arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS for this provider.

valid_until.description: The expiration date and time for the SAML provider in RFC1123 format, e.g. `Mon, 02 Jan 2006 15:04:05 MST`.
